publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2995 Mark Ballard: Royal Highland Show Reception—That the Parliament welcomes the Royal Highland Show reception in the garden lobby of the Scottish Parliament building at 5.30 pm on 21 June 2005 to celebrate the Royal Highland Show at Ingliston from 23 to 26 June; notes the importance of the show in attracting 150,000 visitors annually to see 2,000 exhibitors at Scotland’s largest showcase for food and drink; further notes that the Royal Highland Showground attracts 1.2 million visitors annually, and supports the future of this excellent event at Ingliston.
